oai_dc:dc.dc:description: The Mason Wasp (? Genus Lyrops) who shot his wife for making a personal remark. By /han=kasso (L VIII.-12. 7098-7103). The Mason Wasp shoots his wife with an arrow intended for the Hare, then cries regretfully when he sees that she is dead.
oai_dc:dc.dc:title: How the !gabbaken-!gabbaken (the Mason Wasp) punished his wife for making personal remarks
